greeting.initial: Hello %s! I've just registered you to the database
greeting.familiar: What do you need help with %s?

general.title: What can I help you with today?

channelSelect.title: Please select a channel to start posting updates to
channelSelect.text: From now on I will also post updates here
channelSelect.deleteText: Click on a channel to remove it
channelSelect.added: Done! :sunglasses: I will post your daily updates to *#%s*
channelSelect.delete: I will no longer post your daily updates to *#%s* :arrow_right: :wastebasket:

confirmDelete.title: Are you sure?
confirmDelete.text: This channel will no longer receive your daily updates

confirmAdd.title: Are you sure?
confirmAdd.text: This channel will receive your daily updates.

modifyUpdateTime.title: What time would you like me to ping you?
modifyUpdateTime.text: Currently we're scheduled to meet at *%s*

deregister.success: Bye %s :wave: If you'd like to register again simply send me a message.
deregister.title: Are you sure you want to deregister?
